page.title: 13Education in Wilton District
page.content: Education is based on the Comprehensive System for the 5-16/18 age range. For under 5's there is a Montesorri,a nursery school, 3 play groups and a toddler group. Wilton First School with about 170 children, 6 teachers and head provides for the 5-9 age range. Wilton Middle School with about 550 children aged 9-13, 21 teachers and head caters for children of Wilton and nearby villages. At 13+ they move to Westwood St.Thomas Upper School until they are 16, optional to 18. There are over 1,000 students, 62 staff and head. There are 33 optional subjects leading to examinations at G.C.E."O"level, C.S.E. City and Guilds, R.S.A. typing and G.C.E."A"level.In all schools emphasis is laid on Art,Music & Sport along with the other subjects.
